gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.core

Class CoreferenceResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.core.CoreferenceResolver

  • public class CoreferenceResolver
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that contains the core functionality for coreference resolution; that is, linking of coreferential mentions to their referents. It assumes that the coreferential mentions have already been recognized using the methods in ExpressionRecognition.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Method Detail

      • filterCandidates

        public static java.util.List<SurfaceElement> filterCandidates(Strategy strategy,
                                                              SurfaceElement exp,
                                                              java.util.List<SurfaceElement> candidates)
        Identifies all textual units that are potential antecedents for a coreferential mention using the specified strategy. The resulting surface elements are sorted by character offsets.
        Parameters:
        strategy - the resolution strategy to use
        exp - the coreferential mention which referents are sought for
        candidates - the list of candidates to filter
        Returns:
        list of candidates that pass the filter, empty list if no candidates pass the filter

      • scoreCandidates

        public static java.util.Map<SurfaceElement,java.lang.Integer> scoreCandidates(Strategy strategy,
                                                                              SurfaceElement exp,
                                                                              java.util.List<SurfaceElement> candidates)
        Scores a list of candidate referents based on their salience with respect to the coreferential mention.
        Parameters:
        strategy - resolution strategy to use
        exp - the coreferential mention
        candidates - the list of candidate referents to score
        Returns:
        a map of candidate-score key-value pairs

      • calculateSalienceScore

        public static int calculateSalienceScore(SurfaceElement exp,
                                         CoreferenceType corefType,
                                         ExpressionType expType,
                                         SurfaceElement candidate,
                                         java.util.List<ScoringFunction> scoringFunctions)
        Calculate the salience score between a coreferential mention and a candidate referent using a specified list of scoring functions.
        Parameters:
        exp - the coreferential mention
        corefType - the coreference type in consideration
        expType - the mention type in consideration
        candidate - the candidate referent
        scoringFunctions - the list of scoring functions to use
        Returns:
        the agreement score between the coreferential mention and the candidate referent

      • applyPostScoringFilters

        public static java.util.Map<SurfaceElement,java.lang.Integer> applyPostScoringFilters(Strategy strategy,
                                                                                      SurfaceElement exp,
                                                                                      java.util.Map<SurfaceElement,java.lang.Integer> scoreMap)
        Applies post-scoring filters associated with the current resolution strategy to the given coreferential mention
        Parameters:
        strategy - the resolution strategy to use
        exp - the coreferential mention in consideration
        scoreMap - the scoring map formed in previous steps
        Returns:
        the updated scoring map, after filters are applied

      • processSurfaceElement

        public static java.util.List<SurfaceElement> processSurfaceElement(SurfaceElement surf,
                                                                   Strategy strategy)
        Parameters:
        surf - the textual unit to process for coreference
        strategy - the resolution strategy to consider
        Returns:
        a list of candidate referents that are compatible with surf according to strategy

                                              java.util.List<SurfaceElementChain> anaphoraLinks)
        Processes the entire document for anaphora chains.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document to process
        anaphoraLinks - the anaphora chains that are generated by this method
